data.name: Slime Research Demo
data.detailed_description: This demo includes less levels and items than the full version. However, you can still create custom levels and share custom levels. Unfortunately due to Steam Workshop's design, the Demo can Upload, but NOT Download Steam Workshop levels.
data.about_the_game: This demo includes less levels and items than the full version. However, you can still create custom levels and share custom levels. Unfortunately due to Steam Workshop's design, the Demo can Upload, but NOT Download Steam Workshop levels.
data.short_description: Get a taste of Slime Research for free!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.11+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
